column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm going to hold off on giving a pizza place in Chicago 5 stars until I've tried all the deep dishes in the area
column6: hands down. I think the thing that stands out at Lou Malnati's is the fresh tasting tomato sauce and the crust. The crust was a perfect crispiness
column7: and a good amount of it too (some places have too much crust and it's like eating bread with cheese).
